Comment.value:
How to Use: During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntax prompt below.


Subraces - Elf


Drow (Male only)

Syntax: Drow-male

Stats: 
+2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence

Feats: 
Ambidexterity

Skills: 
+4 Parry, +4 Intimidate

Spell Resistance: 
SR 10 + 1 level to 50 max

Light Sensitive: 
-2 ab/-4 ac in outdoor areas during daylight hours.

Special Ability: 
Death Lance: Once per day Male Drows may cast a special Greater Magic Weapon, which retains the effects of the original spell and adds ability drain strength with a DC Scaling:
1-10: 8
11-20: 14
21-30: 26
31-40: 36
41-50: 46
51-60: 56



Drow (Female Only)

Syntax: Drow-female

Stats: 
+2 Strength, -2 Constitution, +4 Wisdom

Feats: 
Combat Casting

Skills: 
+6 Concentration

Spell Resistance: 
SR 10 + 1 level to 50 max

Light Sensitive: 
-2 ab/-4 ac in outdoor areas during daylight hours.

Special Ability: 
Wand of Viscid Globs: 3 times per day Drow Females may cast a special Bigby Crushing Hand. This works identically to original spell except in it's visual effects and the ability used in the grabble check is Wisdom.



Grey Elf

Syntax: Elf-grey

Stats: 
+4 Intelligence, -2 Strength

Skills: 
+8 Concentration, +8 Spellcraft

Feats: 
Combat Casting, Spell Focus: Evocation



Wild Elf

Syntax: Elf-wild

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +2 Wisdom,
 
Feats: 
Wildshape. This allows non-druids to become shifters. You still need to be able to cast 3rd level spells. Bard, Wizard, Sorcerer, etc, all work.



Wood Elf

Syntax: Elf-wood

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +4 Dexterity, -2 Charisma

Skills: 
+4 Hide, +4 Move Silently

Feats: 
Weapon Focus Longbow, Point Blank Shot

Special Ability: 
Wood elves receive concealment equal to 10 + base hide skill in all natural outdoor environments (max 60%)

Drow (Male only)

Wand of Viscid Globs: 3 times per day Drow Females may cast a special Bigby Crushing Hand. This works identically to original spell except in it's visual effects and the ability used in the grabble check is Wisdom.



Grey Elf

Wild Elf

Skills:

Feats: 
Weapon Focus Longbow, Point Blank Shot

Special Ability: 
Wood elves receive concealment equal to 10 + base hide skill in all natural outdoor environments (max 60%)
